text: The Supreme Soviet of the Turkmen SSR (Turkmen: Түркменистан ССР Ёкары Советы, Türkmenistan SSR Yokary Sowety; Russian: Верховный Совет Туркменской ССР tr. Verkhovnyy Sovet Turkmenskoy SSR) was the supreme soviet (main legislative institution) of the Turkmen SSR, one of the union republics of the Soviet Union. The Supreme Soviet of the Turkmen SSR was established in 1938 and disbanded in 1992. It was succeeded by the Assembly of Turkmenistan in 1992. == Chairmen of the Supreme Soviet == {| class="wikitable" !Portrait !Chairman !From !To |- |105x105px |Allaberdy Berdyev |24 July 1938 |27 January 1942 |- |105x105px |Kurban Permanov |27 January 1942 |March 1947 |- |105x105px |Shadzha Batyrov |March 1947 |March 1948 |- |105x105px |Yusup Ovezov |March 1948 |1956 |- |105x105px |Tore Ataev |1956 |30 March 1959 |- |105x105px |Shamurad Tashliev |30 March 1959 |26 March 1963 |- |105x105px |Makhtum Shabasanov |26 March 1963 |April 1967 |- |105x105px |Pigam Azimov |April 1967 |29 June 1971 |- |105x105px |Davly Karaev |29 June 1971 |1973 |- |105x105px |Bally Yazkuliev |5 July 1973 |17 December 1975 |- |105x105px |Aman Durdyev |17 December 1975 |21 March 1980 |- |105x105px |Orazgeldy Ovezgeldyev |21 March 1980 |18 January 1990 |- | align="center" |105x105px |Saparmurat Niyazov |18 January 1990 |2 November 1990 |- |105x105px |Sahat Muradov |18 November 1990 |1992 |} == Chairmen of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet == The Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the Turkmen SSR was dissolved on January 18, 1990. Thus, all powers of the Chairman of the Presidium were transferred to the Chairman of the Supreme Soviet of the Turkmen SSR. {| class="wikitable" !Portrait !Chairman !From !To |- |105x105px |Khivali Babev |26 July 1938 |January 1942 |- |105x105px |Allaberdy Berdyev |27 January 1942 |6 March 1948 |- |105x105px |Akmamed Saryev |6 March 1948 |30 March 1959 |- |105x105px |Nurberdy Bayramov |30 March 1959 |26 March 1963 |- |105x105px |Annamuhammed Klychev |26 March 1963 |15 December 1978 |- |105x105px |Bally Yazkuliev |15 December 1978 |13 August 1988 |- |105x105px |Roza Bazarova |13 August 1988 |18 January 1990 |} == See also == * Supreme Soviet * Assembly of Turkmenistan == References == Category:Historical legislatures Category:Turkmen Soviet Socialist Republic Category:Government of Turkmenistan Category:1938 establishments in the Soviet Union Category:1992 disestablishments in Turkmenistan Category:Defunct unicameral legislatures
title: Supreme Soviet of the Turkmen SSR
